Class ProductionMachine

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Component
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.ProductionMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Figure, Visitable, Serializable
public class ProductionMachine extends Component
Represents a production machine in the simulation. A production machine is placed inside a room and can be activated or deactivated. It has a production rate and a visual style that changes based on its state.
See Also:

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    activate()
    Activates the machine, changing its style to active.
    void
    behave()
    Defines the behavior of the production machine: deactivates if a robot is at its visit position, otherwise activates.

    Deactivates the machine, changing its style to inactive.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductionMachine

      public ProductionMachine(String name, int x, int y, int size, int productionRate, Room parentRoom, Factory factory) throws InvalidComponentPlacementException
      Constructs a ProductionMachine with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the production machine.
      x - the x-coordinate of the production machine.
      y - the y-coordinate of the production machine.
      size - the size of the production machine.
      productionRate - the production rate of the machine.
      parentRoom - the room in which the machine is placed.
      factory - the factory to which the machine belongs.
      Throws:
      InvalidComponentPlacementException - if the machine does not fit or is not inside the specified room.
